title: Yes: 9012 Live
creator_credit: Tony Dimitriades and Warner Music UK
brief_description: 9012Live is a concert film featuring the English rock band Yes, recorded at Northlands Coliseum in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada on 28 and 29 September 1984 on the band’s tour in support of their eleventh studio album, 90125.

constellations_other.name: Music and fandom
constellations_other.description: Sometimes fans create their own amazing artworks.

description: 9012Live is a concert film featuring the English rock band Yes, recorded at Northlands Coliseum in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada on 28 and 29 September 1984 on the band’s tour in support of their eleventh studio album, 90125. It mostly features performances from 90125, which was their highest selling album.- Wikipedia
description_for_label: 9012Live is a concert film featuring the English rock band Yes, recorded at Northlands Coliseum in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada on 28 and 29 September 1984 on the band’s tour in support of their eleventh studio album, 90125. It mostly features performances from 90125, which was their highest selling album.- Wikipedia
